Ghazghkull Thraka.name: Ghazghkull Thraka

unit.name: Prophet of Da Great Waaagh!
unit.description: While this unit is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll and if the Waaagh! is active for your army, a Critical Hit is scored on a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+. Ghazghkull’s Waaagh! Banner (Aura): While a friendly ORKS unit is within 12" of Makari, if the Waaagh! is active for your army, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

Ghazghkull Thraka.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Boyz Breaka Boyz Meganobz Nobz If this unit’s Bodyguard unit is destroyed, Ghazkghull Thraka and Makari become a single unit with their original Starting Strength .
led_by: Boyz Breaka Boyz Meganobz Nobz If this unit’s Bodyguard unit is destroyed
Ghazkghull Thraka and Makari become a single unit with their original Starting Strength .
can_lead: the following units: Boyz Breaka Boyz Meganobz Nobz If this unit’s Bodyguard unit is destroyed
Makari become a single unit with their original Starting Strength
default_wargear: 1 Ghazghkull Thraka – EPIC HERO 1 Makari Ghazghkull Thraka is equipped with: Mork’s Roar; Gork’s Klaw. Makari is equipped with: Makari’s stabba.

Warboss.name: Warboss

unit.name: Might is Right
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll . Da Biggest and da Best: While the Waaagh! is active for your army, add 4 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s melee weapons.

Warboss.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Boyz Breaka Boyz Nobz
can_lead: the following units: Boyz Breaka Boyz Nobz
default_wargear: 1 Warboss This model is equipped with: kombi-weapon; twin slugga; big choppa.

Warboss in Mega Armour.name: Warboss in Mega Armour

unit.name: Might is Right
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll . Dead Brutal: While the Waaagh! is active for your army, this model’s ’uge choppa has a Damage characteristic of 3.

Warboss in Mega Armour.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following unit: Meganobz
default_wargear: 1 Warboss in Mega Armour This model is equipped with: big shoota; ’uge choppa.

Big Mek with Shokk Attack Gun.name: Big Mek with Shokk Attack Gun

unit.name: More Dakka
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. Deranged Snotling Assault: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks; that unit must take a Battle-shock test .

unit.name: Grot Assistant
unit.description: Once per battle, after rolling to determine how many attacks the bearer’s shokk attack gun makes, you can re-roll that dice. Designer’s Note: Place a Grot Assistant token next to the bearer, removing it once this ability has been used.

Big Mek with Shokk Attack Gun.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Boyz Breaka Boyz Lootas Mek Gunz Nobz Tankbustas
led_by: Boyz Breaka Boyz Lootas Mek Gunz Nobz Tankbustas
can_lead: the following units: Boyz Breaka Boyz Lootas Mek Gunz Nobz Tankbustas
default_wargear: 1 Big Mek with Shokk Attack Gun This model is equipped with: close combat weapon, shokk attack gun.

Big Mek in Mega Armour.name: Big Mek in Mega Armour

unit.name: More Dakka
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. Fix Dat Armour Up: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase , you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit.

unit.name: Kustom Force Field
unit.description: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

unit.name: Grot Oiler
unit.description: Once per battle, at the end of your Movement phase , one model in the bearer’s unit regains D3 lost wounds. Designer’s Note: Place a Grot Oiler token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.

Big Mek in Mega Armour.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following unit: Meganobz
default_wargear: 1 Big Mek in Mega Armour This model is equipped with: kustom-mega blaster; power klaw.

Painboy.name: Painboy

unit.name: Dok’s Toolz
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. Hold Still and Say ‘Aargh!’: Each time an attack made by this model with its ’urty syringe scores a Critical Wound against a unit (excluding VEHICLE units), that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds .

unit.name: Grot Orderly
unit.description: Once per battle, in your Command phase , if the bearer is leading a unit that is below its Starting Strength , you can return up to D3 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit. Designer’s Note: Place a Grot Orderly token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used

Painboy.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Boyz Breaka Boyz Burna Boyz Lootas Nobz Tankbustas
led_by: Boyz Breaka Boyz Burna Boyz Lootas Nobz Tankbustas
can_lead: the following units: Boyz Breaka Boyz Burna Boyz Lootas Nobz Tankbustas
default_wargear: 1 Painboy This model is equipped with: power klaw; ’urty syringe.

Weirdboy.name: Weirdboy

unit.name: Waaagh! Energy
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Strength and Damage characteristics of this model’s ’Eadbanger weapon for every 5 models in that unit (rounding down), but while that unit contains 10 or more models, that weapon has the [HAZARDOUS] ability. Da Jump (Psychic): Once per turn, at the end of your Movement phase , one WEIRDBOY from your army can use this ability. If it does, roll one D6: on a 1, that WEIRDBOY ’s unit suffers D6 mortal wounds ; on a 2+, remove this WEIRDBOY ’s unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

Weirdboy.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Boyz Breaka Boyz
can_lead: the following units: Boyz Breaka Boyz
default_wargear: 1 Weirdboy This model is equipped with: ’Eadbanger; weirdboy staff.

Boyz.name: Boyz

unit.name: Get Da Good Bitz
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Big Mek Big Mek With Shokk Attack Gun Ghazghkull Thraka Mek Painboy Warboss Weirdboy Big Mek With Kustom Force Field Mad Dok Grotsnik Nob With Waaagh! Banner Ufthak Blackhawk

default_wargear: 1 Boss Nob 9-19 Boyz The Boss Nob is equipped with: slugga; big choppa. Every Boy is equipped with: slugga; choppa.

Gretchin.name: Gretchin

unit.name: Runtherd
unit.description: While this unit contains one or more Gretchin models, each time an attack targets this unit, Runtherd models in this unit have a Toughness characteristic of 2. Thievin’ Scavengers: At the start of your Movement phase , roll one D6 for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it (excluding Battle-shocked units). If one or more of those rolls is a 4+, you gain 1CP.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Zodgrod Wortsnagga Da Red Gobbo

default_wargear: 1 Runtherd and 10 Gretchin OR 2 Runtherds and 20 Gretchin Every Runtherd is equipped with: slugga; Runtherd tools. Every Gretchin is equipped with: grot blasta; close combat weapon.

Nobz.name: Nobz

unit.name: Da Boss’ Ladz
unit.description: While a WARBOSS model is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll .

unit.name: Ammo Runt
unit.description: Once per battle for each ammo runt this unit has, when this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. Designer’s Note: Place the relevant number of Ammo Runt tokens next to the unit, removing one each time the unit uses this ability.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Big Mek Big Mek With Shokk Attack Gun Ghazghkull Thraka Mek Painboy Warboss Big Mek With Kustom Force Field Mad Dok Grotsnik Nob With Waaagh! Banner Ufthak Blackhawk

default_wargear: 1 Boss Nob 4-9 Nobz Every model is equipped with: slugga; big choppa.

Meganobz.name: Meganobz

unit.name: Krumpin’ Time
unit.description: While the Waaagh! is active for your army, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

unit.name: 2-6 Meganobz Every model is equipped with
unit.description: kustom shoota; power klaw.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Big Mek In Mega Armour Ghazghkull Thraka Warboss In Mega Armour

default_wargear: 2-6 Meganobz Every model is equipped with: kustom shoota; power klaw.

Lootas.name: Lootas

unit.name: Dat’s Our Loot!
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit that is within range of an objective marker , you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Big Mek Big Mek With Shokk Attack Gun Mek Painboy Big Mek With Kustom Force Field Mad Dok Grotsnik

default_wargear: 1-2 Spanners 4-8 Lootas Every Spanner is equipped with: big shoota; close combat weapon. Every Loota is equipped with: deffgun; close combat weapon.

Burna Boyz.name: Burna Boyz

unit.name: Pyromaniaks
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack with a burna that targets an enemy unit within 6", re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If the target of that attack is also within range of an objective marker , you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Painboy Big Mek With Kustom Force Field Mad Dok Grotsnik

default_wargear: 1-2 Spanners 4-8 Burna Boyz Every Spanner is equipped with: close combat weapon; big shoota. Every Burna Boy is equipped with: burna; cuttin’ flames.

Tankbustas.name: Tankbustas

unit.name: Tank Hunters
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll . Bomb Squigs: Once per battle, for each bomb squig this unit has, after this unit ends a Normal move , you can use one Bomb Squig. If you do, select one enemy unit within 12" and visible to this unit and roll one D6: on a 3+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds . Designer’s Note: Place two Bomb Squig tokens next to the unit, removing one each time this unit uses this ability.

unit.name: Pulsa Rokkit
unit.description: Once per battle, when the bearer’s unit is selected to shoot in your Shooting phase , the bearer can use its pulsa rokkit. If it does, until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit by 1.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Big Mek Big Mek With Shokk Attack Gun Mek Painboy Big Mek With Kustom Force Field Mad Dok Grotsnik

Tankbustas.leader_info: If a CHARACTER unit from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to a LOOTAS unit, it can be attached to this unit instead.
default_wargear: 1 Boss Nob 5 Tankbustas The Boss Nob is equipped with: 2 rokkit pistols; choppa. Each Tankbusta is equipped with: rokkit launcha; close combat weapon.

Deff Dread.name: Deff Dread

unit.name: Dead Choppy
unit.description: The Attacks characteristic of this weapon is increased by 1 for each additional dread klaw this model is equipped with.

unit.name: Piston-driven Brutality
unit.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move , select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds ; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

default_wargear: Dead Choppy: The Attacks characteristic of this weapon is increased by 1 for each additional dread klaw this model is equipped with.
1 Deff Dread This model is equipped with: 2 big shootas; 2 dread klaws; stompy feet.

Killa Kans.name: Killa Kans

unit.name: Shooty Power Trip
unit.description: Each time this unit is selected to shoot, you can roll one D6: On a 1-2, this unit suffers D3 mortal wounds . On a 3-4, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit. On a 5-6, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit.

unit.name: 3-6 Killa Kans Every model is equipped with
unit.description: Kan shoota; Kan klaw.

default_wargear: 3-6 Killa Kans Every model is equipped with: Kan shoota; Kan klaw.

Gorkanaut.name: Gorkanaut

ranged.name: Twin big shoota rapid fire 2 twin-linked

unit.name: Clankin’ Forward
unit.description: Each time this model makes a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over enemy models (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there. Big an’ Stompy: Each time this model makes a melee attack, if the Waaagh! is active for your army, add 1 to the Hit roll .

default_wargear: 1 Gorkanaut This model is equipped with: deffstorm mega-shoota; 2 rokkit launchas; skorcha; 2 twin big shootas; klaw of Gork.
Gorkanaut.transport_capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models (excluding GHAZGHKULL THRAKA ). Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models.

Big an’ Shooty: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, if the Waaagh! is active for your army, add 1 to the Hit roll .

default_wargear: 1 Morkanaut This model is equipped with: kustom mega-blasta; kustom mega-zappa; 2 rokkit launchas; 2 twin big shootas; klaw of Mork.

Mek Gunz.name: Mek Gunz

unit.name: Bubblechukka
unit.description: Before selecting targets for one or more models equipped with this weapon, roll one D6 to determine which profile models equipped with this weapon will make attacks with, comparing the result with the numbers shown on the left.

unit.name: Splat!
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that is at its Starting Strength (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ), re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

unit.name: 1-3 Mek Gunz Every model is equipped with
unit.description: smasha gun; grot crew. Designer’s Note: Place five Grot Crew tokens next to each Mek Gun model when this unit is first set up, removing one each time its Mek Gun model loses a wound (a Mek Gun model itself is considered to represent its final wound).

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Big Mek Big Mek With Shokk Attack Gun Mek

default_wargear: 1-3 Mek Gunz Every model is equipped with: smasha gun; grot crew. Designer’s Note: Place five Grot Crew tokens next to each Mek Gun model when this unit is first set up, removing one each time its Mek Gun model loses a wound (a Mek Gun model itself is considered to represent its final wound).

Battlewagon.name: Battlewagon

unit.name: Ramshackle but Rugged
unit.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

unit.name: ’Ard Case
unit.description: Add 2 to the bearer’s Toughness characteristic, but it no longer has the Firing Deck ability.

default_wargear: 1 Battlewagon This model is equipped with: tracks and wheels.

This model has a transport capacity of 22 ORKS INFANTRY models. If this model is equipped with a killkannon, it has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models. Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models. The GHAZGHKULL THRAKA model takes up the space of 4 models.
Battlewagon.transport_capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 22 ORKS INFANTRY models. If this model is equipped with a killkannon, it has a transport capacity of 12 ORKS INFANTRY models. Each MEGA ARMOUR or JUMP PACK model takes up the space of 2 models. The GHAZGHKULL THRAKA model takes up the space of 4 models.
